properties.entry: select sar.*, (select name from sc_amazon_account where id=sar.account_id) as ACCOUNT_NAME from sc_amazon_recommendations sar where 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}
select sar.*, (select name from sc_amazon_account where id=sar.account_id) as ACCOUNT_NAME from sc_amazon_recommendations_pricing sar where 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}
select sar.*, (select name from sc_amazon_account where id=sar.account_id) as ACCOUNT_NAME from sc_amazon_recommendations_fulfillment sar where 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}
select sar.*, (select name from sc_amazon_account where id=sar.account_id) as ACCOUNT_NAME from sc_amazon_recommendations_listing_quality sar where 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}
select sar.*, (select name from sc_amazon_account where id=sar.account_id) as ACCOUNT_NAME from sc_amazon_recommendations_selection sar where 1=1 {@ and sar.account_id = '#accountId#'}
